comments:

For some reason the parser is still working during shutdown.  I'm not sure if 
this is because the parser is not getting the proper shutdown notification or 
whether the parser is not properly stopping it's workers.  Jeff, can you have a 
look at this?

The parser wasn't really working during shutdown...the exception was caused by 
the usual reset that occurs after a project close.  Usually when a project is 
closed, the preprocessor resets it's internal state, but on shutdown this was 
failing due to some parse miner objects already being deleted.  I added a 
stronger catch() so this exception should no longer go uncaught.
